item.title: Report X-2024120103
item.description:
Report X-2024120103

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-04T12:24:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-21
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On November 21st a package was discovered leaking during the AM sort. The package contained a drum that contained UN1988, ALDEHYDES FLAMMABLE TOXIC NOS, 3(6.1), III. It appears that the leak occurred at the closure of the drum. The drum was placed into a steel salvage drum and an amended shippers declaration was requested.

item.title: Report X-2024111002
item.description:
Report X-2024111002

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-28T06:19:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-25
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared Hazmat. No spill. Torn box without "nonspillable" marking, required per 49 CFR 173.159a(c)(2). Two of 10 x 3.2lb Ritar RT6100 vrla sealed batteries (6V10Ah/20hr) missing, one abraded after protruding from pkg, one has bent terminals. No terminal guards/short circuit protection.
